verses.verse: For the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> a <S%G4639>shadow<s%> of <S%G18>good<s%> things to <S%G3195>come,<s%> and not the <S%G846>very<s%> <S%G1504>image<s%> of the <S%G4229>things,<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G3763>never<s%> with <S%G3588>those<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G2378>sacrifices<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> they <S%G4374>offered<s%> <S%G1763>year<s%> by <S%G1763>year<s%> <S%G1519>continually<s%> <S%G1336><s%> <S%G5055>make<s%> the <S%G4334>comers<s%> <S%G4334>thereunto<s%> <S%G5048>perfect.<s%>

For then would they not have <S%G3973>ceased<s%> to be <S%G4374>offered?<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> that the <S%G3000>worshippers<s%> <S%G530>once<s%> <S%G2508>purged<s%> should <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G2089>more<s%> <S%G4893>conscience<s%> of <S%G266>sins.<s%>
But in <S%G3588>those<s%> <S%G846><s%> sacrifices there is a <S%G364>remembrance<s%> <S%G364>again<s%> made of <S%G266>sins<s%> <S%G2596>every<s%> <S%G1763>year.<s%>
For it is not <S%G102>possible<s%> that the <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G5022>bulls<s%> and of <S%G5131>goats<s%> should <S%G851>take<s%> <S%G851>away<s%> <S%G266>sins.<s%>

<S%G1352>Why<s%> when he comes <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2889>world,<s%> he <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G2378>Sacrifice<s%> and <S%G4376>offering<s%> you <S%G2309>would<s%> not, but a <S%G4983>body<s%> have you <S%G2675>prepared<s%> me:
In <S%G3646>burnt<s%> <S%G3646>offerings<s%> and sacrifices for <S%G266>sin<s%> you have had <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G2106>pleasure.<s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> I, <S%G2400>See,<s%> I <S%G2240>come<s%> (in the <S%G2777>volume<s%> of the <S%G975>book<s%> it is <S%G1125>written<s%> of me,) to <S%G4160>do<s%> your <S%G2307>will,<s%> O <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G511>Above<s%> when he <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G2378>Sacrifice<s%> and <S%G4376>offering<s%> and <S%G3646>burnt<s%> <S%G3646>offerings<s%> and offering for <S%G266>sin<s%> you <S%G2309>would<s%> not, <S%G3761>neither<s%> had <S%G2106>pleasure<s%> therein; <S%G3748>which<s%> are <S%G4374>offered<s%> by the <S%G3551>law;<s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G2046>said<s%> he, <S%G2400>See,<s%> I <S%G2240>come<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> your <S%G2307>will,<s%> O <S%G2316>God.<s%> He <S%G337>takes<s%> <S%G337>away<s%> the <S%G4413>first,<s%> that he may <S%G2476>establish<s%> the <S%G1208>second.<s%>

By the <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2307>will<s%> we are <S%G37>sanctified<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G4376>offering<s%> of the <S%G4983>body<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2178>once<s%> for <S%G2178>all.<s%>

And <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G2409>priest<s%> <S%G2476>stands<s%> <S%G2596>daily<s%> <S%G2250><s%> <S%G3008>ministering<s%> and <S%G4374>offering<s%> <S%G4178>oftentimes<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G2378>sacrifices,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G3763>never<s%> <S%G4014>take<s%> <S%G4014>away<s%> <S%G266>sins:<s%>

But <S%G3778>this<s%> man, after he had <S%G4374>offered<s%> <S%G3391>one<s%> <S%G2378>sacrifice<s%> for <S%G266>sins<s%> for <S%G1336>ever,<s%> <S%G2523>sat<s%> <S%G2523>down<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> the <S%G1188>right<s%> hand of <S%G2316>God;<s%>
From now <S%G3063>on<s%> <S%G1551>expecting<s%> <S%G2193>till<s%> his <S%G2190>enemies<s%> be <S%G5087>made<s%> his <S%G5286>footstool.<s%>
For by <S%G3391>one<s%> <S%G4376>offering<s%> he has <S%G5048>perfected<s%> for <S%G1336>ever<s%> them that are <S%G37>sanctified.<s%>
Whereof the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> is a <S%G3140>witness<s%> to us: for <S%G3326>after<s%> that he had <S%G4280>said<s%> <S%G4280>before,<s%>

<S%G3778>This<s%> is the <S%G1242>covenant<s%> that I will <S%G1303>make<s%> with them <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G2250>days,<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> I will <S%G1325>put<s%> my <S%G3551>laws<s%> <S%G1909>into<s%> their <S%G2588>hearts,<s%> and in their <S%G1271>minds<s%> will I <S%G1924>write<s%> them;
And their <S%G266>sins<s%> and <S%G458>iniquities<s%> will I <S%G3415>remember<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G2089>more.<s%>
<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> <S%G859>remission<s%> of <S%G5130>these<s%> is, there is <S%G3765>no<s%> <S%G2089>more<s%> <S%G4376>offering<s%> for <S%G266>sin.<s%>
<S%G2192>Having<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G3954>boldness<s%> to <S%G1529>enter<s%> into the <S%G39>holiest<s%> by the <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%>

By a <S%G4372>new<s%> and <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G3598>way,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> he has <S%G1457>consecrated<s%> for us, <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G2665>veil,<s%> that is to say, his <S%G4561>flesh;<s%>
And having an <S%G3173>high<s%> <S%G2409>priest<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> the <S%G3624>house<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%>

Let us <S%G4334>draw<s%> <S%G4334>near<s%> with a <S%G228>true<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%> in <S%G4136>full<s%> <S%G4136>assurance<s%> of <S%G4102>faith,<s%> having our <S%G2588>hearts<s%> <S%G4473>sprinkled<s%> from an <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G4893>conscience,<s%> and our <S%G4983>bodies<s%> <S%G3068>washed<s%> with <S%G2513>pure<s%> <S%G5204>water.<s%>

Let us <S%G2722>hold<s%> <S%G2722>fast<s%> the <S%G3671>profession<s%> of our <S%G1680>faith<s%> <S%G186>without<s%> <S%G186>wavering;<s%> (for he is <S%G4103>faithful<s%> that <S%G1861>promised;<s%>)
And let us <S%G2657>consider<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another<s%> to <S%G3948>provoke<s%> to <S%G26>love<s%> and to <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2041>works:<s%>

Not <S%G1459>forsaking<s%> the <S%G1997>assembling<s%> of <S%G1438>ourselves<s%> <S%G1997>together,<s%> as the <S%G1485>manner<s%> of <S%G5100>some<s%> is; but <S%G3870>exhorting<s%> one another: and <S%G5118>so<s%> <S%G5118>much<s%> the <S%G3123>more,<s%> as you <S%G991>see<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G1448>approaching.<s%>

For if we <S%G264>sin<s%> <S%G1596>willfully<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> that we have <S%G2983>received<s%> the <S%G1922>knowledge<s%> of the <S%G225>truth,<s%> there <S%G620>remains<s%> <S%G3765>no<s%> <S%G2089>more<s%> <S%G2378>sacrifice<s%> for <S%G266>sins,<s%>

But a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G5398>fearful<s%> <S%G1561>looking<s%> for of <S%G2920>judgment<s%> and <S%G4442>fiery<s%> <S%G2205>indignation,<s%> which shall <S%G2068>devour<s%> the <S%G5227>adversaries.<s%>

He that <S%G114>despised<s%> <S%G3475>Moses'<s%> <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G599>died<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> <S%G3628>mercy<s%> <S%G1909>under<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G3144>witnesses:<s%>

Of <S%G4214>how<s%> <S%G4214>much<s%> <S%G5501>sorer<s%> <S%G5098>punishment,<s%> <S%G1380>suppose<s%> you, shall he be thought <S%G515>worthy,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> has <S%G2662>trodden<s%> <S%G2662>under<s%> <S%G2662>foot<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and has <S%G2233>counted<s%> the <S%G129>blood<s%> of the <S%G1242>covenant,<s%> with <S%G1722>which<s%> <S%G3739><s%> he was <S%G37>sanctified,<s%> an <S%G2839>unholy<s%> thing, and has <S%G1796>done<s%> <S%G1796>despite<s%> to the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G5485>grace?<s%>

For we <S%G1492>know<s%> him that has <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G1557>Vengeance<s%> belongs to me, I will <S%G467>recompense,<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%> And <S%G3825>again,<s%> The <S%G2962>Lord<s%> shall <S%G2919>judge<s%> his <S%G2992>people.<s%>
It is a <S%G5398>fearful<s%> thing to <S%G1706>fall<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G5495>hands<s%> of the <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>

But <S%G363>call<s%> to <S%G363>remembrance<s%> the <S%G4386>former<s%> <S%G2250>days,<s%> in <S%G3739>which,<s%> after you were <S%G5461>illuminated,<s%> you <S%G5278>endured<s%> a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G119>fight<s%> of <S%G3804>afflictions;<s%>

<S%G5124>Partly,<s%> <S%G3303><s%> whilst you were <S%G2301>made<s%> a <S%G2301>spectacle<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> by <S%G3680>reproaches<s%> and <S%G2347>afflictions;<s%> and <S%G5124>partly,<s%> <S%G1161><s%> whilst you <S%G1096>became<s%> <S%G2844>companions<s%> of them that were <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G390>used.<s%>

For you had <S%G4834>compassion<s%> of me in my <S%G1199>bonds,<s%> and <S%G4327>took<s%> <S%G3326>joyfully<s%> <S%G5479><s%> the <S%G724>spoiling<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5224>goods,<s%> <S%G1097>knowing<s%> in <S%G1438>yourselves<s%> that you <S%G2192>have<s%> in <S%G3772>heaven<s%> a <S%G2909>better<s%> and an <S%G3306>enduring<s%> <S%G5223>substance.<s%>

<S%G577>Cast<s%> not <S%G577>away<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3954>confidence,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G3405>recompense<s%> of <S%G3405>reward.<s%>
For you have <S%G5532>need<s%> of <S%G5281>patience,<s%> that, after you have <S%G4160>done<s%> the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> you might <S%G2865>receive<s%> the <S%G1860>promise.<s%>
For <S%G2089>yet<s%> a <S%G3397>little<s%> <S%G3397>while,<s%> and he that shall <S%G2064>come<s%> will <S%G2240>come,<s%> and will not <S%G5549>tarry.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> the <S%G1342>just<s%> shall <S%G2198>live<s%> by <S%G4102>faith:<s%> but <S%G1437>if<s%> any man <S%G5288>draw<s%> <S%G5288>back,<s%> my <S%G5590>soul<s%> shall have <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G2106>pleasure<s%> in him.
But we are not of them who <S%G5289>draw<s%> <S%G5289>back<s%> to <S%G684>perdition;<s%> but of them that <S%G4102>believe<s%> to the <S%G4047>saving<s%> of the <S%G5590>soul.<s%>
